00030 class FilePtr: public ValuePtr<uint8_t>
00031 {
00032     struct Closer {
00033         int file;
00034         size_t len;
00035         boost::filesystem::path filename;
00036         void operator()( void *p );
00037     };
00038     typedef data::ValuePtrReference( *generator_type )( data::FilePtr &, size_t, size_t );
00039     struct GeneratorMap: public std::map<unsigned short, generator_type> {
00040         GeneratorMap();
00041         template<class T> static data::ValuePtrReference generator( data::FilePtr &mfile, size_t offset, size_t len ) {return mfile.at<T>( offset, len );}
00042         struct proc {
00043             std::map<unsigned short, generator_type> *m_map;
00044             proc( std::map<unsigned short, generator_type> *map ): m_map( map ) {}
00045             template<class T> void operator()( const T & ) {
00046                 m_map->insert( std::make_pair( ValuePtr<T>::staticID, &generator<T> ) );
00047             }
00048         };
00049     };
00050 
00051     bool map( int file, size_t len, bool write, const boost::filesystem::path &filename );
00052     size_t checkSize( bool write, int file, const boost::filesystem::path &filename, size_t size = 0 );
00053     bool m_good;
00054 public:
00075     FilePtr( const boost::filesystem::path &filename, size_t len = 0, bool write = false );
00076 
00088     template<typename T> ValuePtr<T> at( size_t offset, size_t len = 0 ) {
00089         boost::shared_ptr<T> ptr = boost::static_pointer_cast<T>( getRawAddress( offset ) );
00090 
00091         if( len == 0 ) {
00092             len = ( getLength() - offset ) / sizeof( T );
00093             LOG_IF( ( getLength() - offset ) % sizeof( T ), Runtime, warning )
00094                     << "The remaining filesize " << getLength() - offset << " does not fit the bytesize of the requested type "
00095                     << util::Value<T>::staticName();
00096         }
00097 
00098         LOG_IF( len * sizeof( T ) > ( getLength() - offset ), Debug, error ) << "The requested length will be " << len - ( getLength() - offset ) << " bytes behind the end of the source.";
00099         return data::ValuePtr<T>( ptr, len );
00100     }
00101 
00112     data::ValuePtrReference atByID( unsigned short ID, size_t offset, size_t len = 0 );
00113 
00114     bool good();
00115     void close();
00116 };
